short_summary: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) wishes to enter into a contract with a vendor(s) for the purpose of providing Waste Management Services on Granville Island. The anticipated value of the service is estimated to be up to $2,500,000.00 CDN for the initial term and all renewals including all applicable taxes.
description: Waste Management Services on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia. This Agreement will have an initial term of up to three (3) years, with the potential to renew for two (2) subsequent one-year renewals, not to exceed a cumulative total of five (5) years.||SEE DETAILS BELOW FOR SPECIFICATIONS||
full_summary:
## Tender: Waste Management Services (Granville Island)
## Solicitation Number: RFP-002729
### Tender Details
- **Title (English)**: RFP-002729-Waste Management Services (Granville Island)
- **Title (French)**: DDP-002729 – Services de gestion des déchets (Granville Island)
- **Reference Number**: cb-364-51338836
- **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
- **Tender Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)

### Tender Frequency and Duration
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-08T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Non spécifié (Not specified)
- **Expected Contract End Date**: Non spécifié (Not specified)

### Services Required
- **Description (English)**: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is seeking a vendor to provide Waste Management Services on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia.
- **Description (French)**: La Société canadienne d’hypothèque et de logement (SCHL) souhaite que les services de gestion des déchets soient fournis à Granville Island, à Vancouver, en Colombie-Britannique.

### Important Notes
- The initial contract will be for up to three (3) years, with the possibility of renewal for two (2) one-year terms, not exceeding a total of five (5) years.
- The anticipated value of the service is estimated at up to $2,500,000.00 CDN for the initial term and all renewals, including taxes.
- Suppliers must download the solicitation document and attachments directly from the tender page on canadabuys.canada.ca.

### Additional Information
- **Contact Person**: Tim Webster
- **Email**: tjwebste@cmhc-schl.gc.ca
- **Phone**: 613748-5680
- **Attachments**: The tender notice and attachments can be downloaded from the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36287/rfp-002729-waste-management-services-%28granville-island_0.pdf

### Important Documents
- **Tender Notice**: rfp-002729-waste-management-services-%28granville-island_0.pdf
